data.text: @ritters90 @theviveevent @UCDavisCoLab @FINNPartners Ritesh, please keep an eye out for @HappyHopeKidSo1 - I encouraged her to get to your innovation session... #VIVE2022

@drhershkowitz @Gil_Bashe @ritters90 @theviveevent @UCDavisCoLab @FINNPartners The only way to ever study the long term effects of covid/vaccine is by having a longitudinal medical records.https://t.co/pl9hed779a

@ritters90 @Gil_Bashe @theviveevent @UCDavisCoLab @FINNPartners Seems like a lot of health-oriented humanitarians are headed to #ViVe2022. I wish you all great insights & please recall that human health is dependent on planetary health so I hope all attendees & event organizer choose eco-smart travel & offset all greenhouse gas impacts 🔥🌏
